dcterms:description: The FloodNet dataset consists of high-resolution aerial imagery collected in the aftermath of Hurricane Harvey, used for post-disaster damage assessment. It includes 2348 images and 10,480 question-answer pairs across 7 distinct question categories, facilitating a comprehensive understanding of the affected areas.
dcterms:title: FloodNet
